content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on Veterans who are married to each other, including
combined rate payable to Veterans married to each other
award procedures in Veteran-married-to-Veteran cases
determining the file number to use in combined awards
estranged married Veterans
, and
mandatory election from protected pension in Veteran-married-to-Veteran cases
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Pension - Basic Rate Determinations
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
